author: Mike Robinson
method: Lay the sheets on a damp surface to prevent drying out. Cut into a rectangle.  Place the cheese, herbs and oil in a bowl and mix together.  Put the mixture in the centre of the rectangle and roll up into a spring roll shape.  Twist both the ends to make a cracker shape.  Brush with oil and bake in an oven 200C/400F/Gas 6 for 4 minutes to crisp up.
ingredients: 2-3 sheets buttered filo pastry ,  olive oil ,  1 tsp thyme ,  1 tsp marjoram ,  1 clove garlic ,  85g/3oz goats' cheese cheddar (a hard cheddar-like cheese) - cut into 1cm/in cubes ,  seasoning
